title: r/Prorevenge My Boss Fired Me & Gave My Job to His Mistress!
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP worked at a very high level in a large company. He accidentally discovered that his boss was embezzling money from the company, so OP's boss fired OP. Then, the boss turned around and gave the job to his mistress! OP patiently created a revenge plan that involved luring his boss out of the country (on the boss's dime) during a very important corporate meeting. Then, he tipped off the company that the boss was about to quit. In one weekend, OP destroyed his old boss's job, dreams, and marriage!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
